MSG_COUNT_ALERT_DETAILS: Fire an alert whenever there are {{messageCountOperator}}  than {{messageCountCount}}  messages in the last {{timeStamp}} minutes and then wait at least {{messageCountGrace}} minutes until triggering a new alert (grace time period). While sending an alert, include the last {{messageCountBacklog}}  messages of the stream evaluated for this alert condition.
FIELD_VALUE_ALERT_DETAILS: Fire an alert whenever the field {{fieldValueField}}  has a {{fieldValueType}}  that was  {{fieldValueThreshholdType}} than  {{fieldValueThreshhold}} in the last {{timeStamp}}  minutes and then wait at least {{fieldValueGrace}}  minutes until triggering a new alert (grace period). When sending an alert, include the last {{fieldValueBacklog}}  messages of the stream evaluated for this alert condition.
FIELD_CONTENT_ALERT_DETAILS: Trigger alert when a message arrives that has the field {{fieldContentField}}  set to {{fieldContentCompareToValue}}  and then wait at least {{fieldContentGrace}}  minutes until triggering a new alert(grace time period) When sending an alert, include the last {{fieldContentBacklog}} messages of the stream evaluated for this alert condition.
CREATE_STREAM_PAGE: Create stream to configure your own alerts and rules
STREAM_SUBSCRIBE_ADD_SUCCESS: You have {{crud}} for this stream successfully !!
ERROR_RETRIEVE_ALERTS: Either Service not found or no configured alert found !!
ERROR_RETRIEVE_STREAMS: Either Service not found or no configured stream found !!
ERROR_RETRIEVE_STREAM_RULES: Either Service not found or no configured stream rules found !!
ERROR_RETRIEVE_LOG_MESSAGES: Either Service not found or no configured log messages found  !!
